screen.dataStatement: Select 'Maple Lawn 2.0 Complete (Ready for Testing!' as Notes

reference.displayName: Save and Return to Contact Types

screen.dataStatement: select null as IncubatorID, convert(date, null) as DeliveryDate
select null as HoldingIncubatorID, convert(date, null) as DeliveryDate

screen.displayName: Change Egg Quantity in Holding Incubator

screen.dataStatement: select convert(varchar, null) as LotNbr, convert(date, null) as DeliveryDate_Start, convert(date, null) as DeliveryDate_End, convert(int, null) as DestinationBuildingID, convert(int,null) as OrderStatusID

screen.displayName: Order Lay Date Incubator Eggs Set By

screen.pageName: javascript:showInDialog('List.html', 'Assign Holding Incubators to Lay Date(s)', 1100,500)

screen.dataStatement: select convert(varchar, null) as LotNbr, convert(date, null) as DeliveryDate_Start, convert(date, null) as DeliveryDate_End, convert(int, null) as DestinationBuildingID, convert(int,null) as OrderStatusID, convert(bit,1) as NewOrders
select GETDATE() as DeliveryDate, GETDATE() as SetDate, convert(int,0) as LoadPlanningID
select GETDATE() as DeliveryDate, GETDATE() as SetDate
select 1 As RowNumber union select 2 union select 3 union select 4
select convert(date, null) as DeliveryDate, convert(int,null) as OrderID, convert(nvarchar(255),'') as DeliveryDescription
select convert(varchar, null) as LotNbr, convert(date, null) as DeliveryDate_Start, convert(date, null) as DeliveryDate_End, convert(int, null) as DestinationBuildingID
select CoolerID as CoolerID, convert(bit, 0) as HistoricalLayDate, convert(bit, 0) as FlockID, convert(date,null) as LayDate from Cooler where Cooler = 'Main Cooler'
select getdate() as DeliveryDate, null as LotNbr
select getdate() as DeliveryDate, null as LotNbr
select getdate() as DeliveryDate, null as LotNbr
select getdate() as DeliveryDate, null as LotNbr
select getdate() as DeliveryDate, null as LotNbr
select cast(null as int) as FlockID
select getdate() as DeliveryDate, null as LotNbr
select convert(date,null) as StartDate, convert(date, null) as EndDate
select convert(date, null) as StartDate, convert(date, null) as EndDate
select convert(date, null) as StartDate, convert(date, null) as EndDate, convert(int, null) as FarmID
select convert(int, null) as FarmID, convert(int, null) as PulletFacilityID

screen.displayStyle: Security For Screen and Menu Item

screen.displayName: Support - Activity - Summary by IP address
